content:
Hi, I have opened a PR, adding the notations ◁ᵢ and ▷ᵢ for whiskerLeftIso and whiskerRightIso, respectively.
Since ⊗ᵢ already exists as notation for tensorIso, this felt like a natural extension. The PR is labeled “easy” as it only adds a few lines.
I originally ran into this while using whiskerRightIso in another PR, and I thought having dedicated notation would make the equations cleaner and more compact.

I suggest not adding easy unless the change is entirely uncontroversial--like fixing typos or an obvious mistake. If there is any chance the review takes more than 20 seconds or there may be feedback or an objection, I'd suggest not adding easy, e.g. this applies to basically any PR adding something.
Yeah, I don't think this counts either
Oh sorry!! got it :+1:
